p: To better replicate the viral tropism observed in the patient, infection assays were performed with EV71-VP1 97R167G, EV71-VP1 97L167E and EV71-VP1 97R/L167G/E in complex tissue models, in vitro reconstituted from human primary cells, that mimic the upper respiratory tract, small intestine and neural tissues composed of neurons and glial cells.
